Author: jl777c#5810
Content: invrmd160 and invsha256

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: just do invsha256(invrmd160(base58 address -> rmd160)) and you will get the pubkey, then do a pub2priv on that to get the privkey

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: alternatively, just scan 2^256 addresses generated from privkeys
